content: {"hypothesis": "The pattern of colored cells in the input grid is rotated 90 degrees clockwise to obtain the output grid.", "sub_hypotheses": ["Level 1: Each colored cell in the input grid is rotated 90 degrees clockwise around the centroid of the colored cells.", "Level 2: There are no group-level patterns since there is only one group of colored cells in each grid.", "Level 3: The grid maintains its size and colored cells maintain their relative position but are rotated 90 degrees clockwise around the centroid of the group of colored cells."]}
